name: SEQ_DOC_COLUMN_INFO
description: Stores the sample column information for sequencing documents.

columns.name: SEQ_DOC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the sequencing document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COLUMN_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name of the sample column from the header line of the associated VCF File.

columns.name: ORD_SEQ_DOC_SAMPLE_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the sample type for the sample column from the header line of the assocaited VCF File.
